page.title: 03 TRADE AND FARMING
page.content:
{SHOPPING A lot of people{don't}use the shops in the village because of lack of choice,and what they do have is higher{priced}so they shop elsewhere. Some people like the shops in the village because they are{close at {hand.}Some people shop locally occasionally and use the{big stores. Here are the percentages: { 76%}...{Shop elsewhere. { 15%}...{Shop in the village. { 9%}...{Use both facilities.
{ FARMING The vast majority of the land in this area is farmland. Quite a lot of it is rough grazing for cattle and horses, but most is for cereal crops. The crops generally grown here are {wheat, barley, peas,}and{rape.
